Rossumøya¶

mod

biosim.rossumoya provides the user with the annual cycle on Rossumøya.

This file can also be imported as a module and contains the following classes:

  • MigrationProbabilityCalculator - calculates the probabilities for an animal to migrate.

  • Rossumoya - class where the user creates the island map and initial population. This is also where the different methods for the annual cycle are run.

Note

  • This script requires that textwrap are installed within the Python environment you are running this script in.

class biosim.rossumoya.MigrationProbabilityCalculator(loc, island_map, species)[source]¶

Class used to calculate probabilities for migration.

Constructor that initiate MigrationProbabilityCalculator.

Parameters

  • loc (tuple) – Coordinates for the current position of an animal

  • island_map (dict) – Dictionary with all cells and their locations

Param

species: Herbivore or Carnivore

property propensity_herb¶

Calculates the propensity to migrate from the current location to the four neighbouring cells for Herbivores.

setter

Sets the propensity list values

type

list

property propensity_carn¶

Calculates the propensity to migrate from the current location to the four neighbouring cells for Carnivores.

setter

Sets the propensity list values.

type

list

property probabilities¶

Calculates the probabilities for an animal to move from its current location to the four neighbouring cells, based on the propensities. The formula for calculating the probability to move form

\[\begin{equation} i \mbox{ to } j \in C_{(i)}, \end{equation}\]

is given by

\[\begin{equation} p_{i \rightarrow j} = \frac{ \pi_{i \rightarrow j}}{\sum_{j \in C^{(i)}} \pi _{i \rightarrow j} } \end{equation}\]
Setter

Sets the probabilty list values.

Type

list

class biosim.rossumoya.Rossumoya(island_map=None, ini_pop=None)[source]¶

Class for island in BioSim.

  • ini_pop – List of dictionaries indicating initial population and location.

static check_map_input(island_map)[source]¶

Raises ValueError if input map is not compatible and does not follow restrictions for the geography of the island. Returns True otherwise.

Parameters

island_map (str) – Multiline string indicating the geography of the island.

Returns

True

Return type

bool

static make_geography_coordinates(input_map)[source]¶

Makes a dictionary with coordinates as keys and Cell subclass instances (Savannah, Jungle, Desert, Mountain, Ocean) as values, initiated with default parameters.

Returns

geography_map

Return type

dict

add_population(population)[source]¶

Add population to the island.

Parameters

population (list) – List of dictionaries specifying population and locations.

procreation()[source]¶

Checks for animals in the cells and initiate mating season.

migration()[source]¶

Finds witch animals wants to migrate, and calls _migrate method to initiate migration process.

migrate(migrating_animals, old_loc)[source]¶

Calls the choose_cell method to get new locations for each migrating animal, and moves them there. Then removes all the animals from the old location. Also resets indicator for calculating propensities.

Parameters

  • migrating_animals (list) – List of animals.

  • old_loc (tuple) – Coordinates where the animals migrate from.

choose_cell(loc, species)[source]¶

Uses :class: MigrationProbabilityCalculator to get the probabilities for migrating to each neighbouring cell, and chooses a cell. Returns coordinates of chosen cell to migrate to.

Param

loc: Location coordinates to migrate from.

Param

species: Herbivore or Carnivore

Return choice

Chosen cell coordinates to migrate to.

Return type

tuple

death()[source]¶

Finds all animals that dies, and removes them from their location. Animals die if the prob_death method returns 1.

single_year()[source]¶

Simulates one year at Rossumoya.

map_size()[source]¶

Finds the size of the island_map.

Returns

lower right corner coordinates (max values for row and column)

Return type

tuple
